text: Pierre A.E. Ghislain Beaufays (29 May 1943 – 23 December 2024) was a Belgian politician. As a member of the PSC he was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1987 to 1999 and member of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe from 1995 and 1999. Beaufays died in Eghezée on 23 December 2024, at the age of 81 years old. ==References== Category:Belgian politicians Category:1943 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Namur (province) Category:Belgian mayors
title: Pierre Beaufays
